skins.selfIntroduction: I am the battleship Odin. I existed only within the realm of the Iron Blood navy's imagination. Destiny has brought me here to serve under you and assist in the realization of your goals.
skins.acquisition: Are you the one who summoned me here? I am Odin. I hereby take up post as your tactician.
skins.login: Excellent, you're back. Have you finished work our next plan yet, Commander?
skins.details: I don't understand. Why are all the people at this base so at ease?
skins.secretaryIdle1: One day, I hope to meet the Scharnhorst sisters myself.
skins.secretaryIdle2: Sometimes, things don't go as planned. You must think carefully before committing yourself to anything, Commander.
skins.secretaryIdle3: Don't blame others over things that are out of their control. Nobody can predict the future.
skins.secretaryTouch: Yes? Has there been a change of plans?
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: Y-you will hear from me at the court martial!

skins.shipDescription: I thought I would never have time to pursue the fine arts, and yet here I am now. Your thoughts, Commander? Eastern as this calligraphy may be, does it not suit the connotations of my name?
skins.acquisition: I thought I would never have time to pursue the fine arts, and yet here I am now. Your thoughts, Commander? Eastern as this calligraphy may be, does it not suit the connotations of my name?
skins.login: It is good to see you again. You ought to dedicate your days off to your own hobbies, Commander.
skins.details: I don't understand. Why are all the people at this base so at ease? ...No, it is simply I who is always trying too hard.
skins.secretaryIdle1: Gneisenau, enjoyment of the arts will always elude you if you only think in statistics. You stand to learn from Scharnhorst in that regard.
skins.secretaryIdle2: Lord Tirpitz, whereabouts is Lord Bismarck? Forsooth, 'tis reassuring to know that thou knoweth. I shan't inquire f
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: Stop it! I am trying to focus here!
